DPU_DopplerProcDSP_HW_Resources_t Struct Reference
dopplerProc DPU External Data Structures

Doppler DPU HW configuration parameters. More...

#include <dpu/dopplerproc/dopplerprocdsp.h>

Data Fields

DPU_DopplerProcDSP_EdmaCfg edmaCfg
 EDMA configuration.
 
DPIF_RadarCube radarCube
 Radar Cube.
 
DPIF_DetMatrix detMatrix
 Detection matrix.
 
cmplx16ImRe_t * pingPongBuf
 Scratch buffer pointer for ping pong input from radar cube.
Size: 2 * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) * numDopplerChirps
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_DOPPLERPROCDSP_BUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t pingPongSize
 Size of the Ping pong buffer.
 
void * windowingLog2AbsBuf
 Windowing output and Log2Abs output buffers are overlayed in memory. This is the scratch buffer pointer for windowing output and Log2Abs output.
Size: sizeof(cmplx32ReIm_t) * numDopplerBins =
MAX[(sizeof(cmplx32ReIm_t) * numDopplerBins), (sizeof(uint16_t) * numDopplerBins)]
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_DOPPLERPROCDSP_BUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t windowingLog2AbsSize
 Size of the windowingLog2Abs buffer.
 
cmplx32ReIm_t * fftOutBuf
 Scratch buffer pointer for Doppler FFT output.
Size:
numDopplerBins * sizeof(cmplx32ReIm_t), if BPM is not enabled
numDopplerBins * sizeof(cmplx32ReIm_t) * numTxAntennas, if BPM is enabled
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_DOPPLERPROCDSP_BUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t fftOutSize
 Size of the FFT output buffer.
 
uint16_t * sumAbsBuf
 Scratch buffer pointer for Accumulated sum of log2 absolute over the antennas.
Size: numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t)
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_DOPPLERPROCDSP_BUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t sumAbsSize
 Size of the Accumulated sum of log2 buffer.
 
cmplx16ImRe_t * dftSinCosTable
 Scratch buffer pointer single point DFT coefficients. Data in this buffer needs to be preserved (or recomputed) between frames. This buffer is populated by DPU_DopplerProcDSP_config API.
Size: numDopplerBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_DOPPLERPROCDSP_BUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t dftSinCosSize
 Size of the buffer for DFT Sin/Cos table.
 
cmplx32ReIm_t * twiddle32x32
 Pointer for twiddle table for Doppler FFT. Data in this buffer needs to be preserved (or recomputed) between frames. This buffer is populated by DPU_DopplerProcDSP_config API.
Size: sizeof(cmplx32ReIm_t) * numDopplerBins
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_DOPPLERPROCDSP_BUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t twiddleSize
 Size of the buffer for twiddle table.
 
int32_t * windowCoeff
 Pointer for buffer with window coefficients. Data in this buffer needs to be preserved (or recomputed) between frames. Window must be symmetric, therefore only numDopplerChirps / 2 coefficients are needed to determine the window.
Size: sizeof(int32_t) * numDopplerChirps / 2
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_DOPPLERPROCDSP_BUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT.
 
uint32_t windowSize
 Doppler FFT window size in bytes.
 

Detailed Description

Doppler DPU HW configuration parameters.

The structure is used to hold the HW configuration parameters for the Doppler DPU
